CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV opens door and explains about PCI tasks . INV closes door
CHI is standing in the middle of the room facing door
MOT walks towards desk in corner
MOT walks towards CHI with a box in her hand
CHI walks a few steps backwards
CHI sits down next to MOT
MOT lifts up box a little bit
CHI reaches out for item in box
MOT looks at and points to item on cover
MOT looks at and points to item on cover
CHI holds book while looking at it
MOT looks at and points to item on cover
CHI fidgets with book in her hands
MOT points to top of book
CHI changes her mind about opening book and turns it over
CHI looks at back of book
CHI looks at MOT then down at book
MOT leans towards CHI and turns front page
MOT holds book so CHI can see pictures
CHI raises hand up in the air
CHI moves hand down to page . <aft> CHI pretends she is grabbing something on page and raises hand up in the air again
MOT looks at and points to item on opposite page
MOT moves finger around on page then pulls hand back
CHI pretends she is grabbing something on page
CHI looks at and points to item on page

g.ga: what CHI is banging hand on

u.a: CHI starts banging hand on item on page
CHI continues to bang hand on book
CHI stops banging hand on page
MOT looks at CHI then at item on page
CHI puts finger on her lip

g.ga: brush your teeth when you get up

u.a: CHI holds hand up in front of her with the palm up
MOT looks and points to something on page
CHI looks at what MOT points to
CHI touches palm of her hand with palm of her other hand
<$=2> MOT continues to point to something on page
MOT looks at and points to another item on page
CHI looks at item on page
MOT points to another item on page
CHI looks at item on page
MOT points to something on page
CHI looks at item on page
MOT inclines head to look at CHI
MOT looks at and points to item on page . <aft> MOT points to something else on page and pulls hand away
CHI touches palms of her hand with fingers of other hands
CHI raises arms in the air over her head
MOT looks at and points to something on page . <aft> MOT stops pointing
CHI moves arms down and touches her pigtails
MOT looks at and points to something at page . <aft> MOT looks up at CHI
CHI lets hands slide down pigtails
CHI moves arm further down and holds folded hands right below chin
MOT looks at CHI then at book
MOT looks at and points to something on page . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
CHI touches her shoulder and fidgets with one of the straps of her dress
MOT looks at CHI then at page
CHI turns page . <aft> CHI turns back to previous page
MOT looks at CHI then at book
CHI puts hand on page and starts to turn it
<11-12> MOT looks at CHI . <aft> MOT looks at book
MOT puts book in box and picks up lid
MOT puts top loosely on box
CHI presses top down with both hands
CHI looks down at floor then up at camera
<bef> CHI gets down on hands and knees and crawls a little closer to camera . CHI turns torso towards MOT
CHI sits on her knees with hands in lap
<aft> MOT is holding a box out towards CHI
MOT puts box on floor in front of CHI
CHI holds arms out towards box
MOT sits down in front of box
MOT and CHI takes lid off together
CHI bends all the way over box
CHI straightens up holding arms out in front of her
MOT picks up a puppet from box
CHI lets arms fall down on thighs
CHI looks at puppets in box
MOT starts to put puppet on her hand
CHI looks at puppet on MOT's hand
CHI bends over and reaches out for something in box
CHI looks at puppets in box

e.ga: move hand so it looks like puppet is talking

u.a: MOT moves hand so it looks like puppet is talking
CHI picks up puppet from box
<aft> CHI looks at puppet on MOT's hand
MOT continues to move hand so it looks like puppet is talking
CHI looks at MOT . <aft> CHI looks at puppet on her hand
CHI puts puppet on her hand
MOT taps CHI's puppet with her puppet
<bef> CHI looks at MOT's puppet . CHI looks at puppet on her hand
<aft> CHI starts playing with puppet's eye
MOT touches eye of CHI's puppet with the mouth of her own puppet
CHI plays with face of puppet

e.ga: move hand so it looks like puppet is talking

u.a: MOT moves hands so it looks like her puppet is talking . <aft> MOT puts hand in lap
CHI looks at MOT's puppet . <aft> CHI looks at her own puppet
CHI moves hand so it looks like puppet is talking
MOT moves hand so it looks like puppet is talking
CHI looks at puppet in MOT's hand
CHI continues to move hand so it looks like puppet is talking
MOT moves puppets towards CHI and tickles CHI's nose with mouth of puppet
CHI jerks head back a little
MOT looks down at CHI's puppet
MOT moves hand so it looks like her puppet is talking
CHI bends over to pick up puppet
MOT bends over and picks up CHI's puppet
MOT puts Cookie_Monster puppet on her other hand
CHI watches MOT put puppet on
<bef> CHI puts hands in her lap
MOT raises hand in air . <aft> MOT moves hand so it looks like puppet is talking
CHI reaches hand out towards Cookie_Monster puppet
CHI reaches out for parrot puppet on MOT's hand
CHI looks at puppet on MOT's hand
MOT takes off parrot puppet and offers it to CHI
CHI puts puppet on her hand
MOT moves hand with Cookie_Monster towards CHI
CHI looks at MOT's puppet . <aft> CHI looks at parrot puppet on her hand
CHI looks at puppet in her hand
CHI holds puppet up in front of her and makes it look like puppet is talking
<bef> MOT puts hand in lap . <aft> MOT bends over towards CHI and reaches out towards puppet on CHI's arm
MOT tucks parrot puppet down with empty hand
<bef> MOT puts hand back in lap
CHI looks at parrot puppet in her hand
<bef> MOT lifts hand with Cookie_Monster but changes her mind and puts it back in lap . MOT moves puppet towards CHI's face . <aft> MOT puts hand in lap
CHI turns head around and puts hand holding puppet down so it leans on box
MOT moves hand towards CHI's face
CHI takes her hand out of puppet while touching MOT's puppet with other hand
MOT holds puppet up in front of CHI
CHI puts both hands around Cookie Monster puppet
CHI plays with eyes of puppet with one hand
CHI looks at face of puppet
MOT moves hand holding puppet so it looks like it is talking
MOT moves hand towards CHI's face moving hand so it looks like puppet is talking
CHI keeps holding on to Cookie_Monster puppet with both hands
MOT moves hand towards herself then towards CHI
CHI continues to hold on to puppet
CHI puts hand on MOT's arm
MOT bends forwards while taking off puppet
CHI watches MOT take off puppet
MOT presses puppets in box a couple of times
MOT looks at puppets in box
MOT picks up lid to box
MOT presses lid down with both hands
<bef> MOT tilts box a bit so CHI can see text written on lid
CHI is sitting with hands in her lap
CHI raises arms in air over head
CHI moves hands up and down in sync to words
MOT walks towards CHI with box
MOT puts box in front of CHI and sits down
CHI puts hands on lower corners of box . <aft> CHI starts to open box
MOT bends over towards box and touches crayon in box
CHI bends over box and puts hands in lap
MOT picks up a crayon and holds it up in front of CHI as if she was going to put it in CHI's lap
MOT puts crayon back in box
MOT picks up one more crayon
MOT reaches out for paper in box
MOT pulls out a piece of paper from box
MOT holds paper up in front of CHI
CHI looks at paper MOT holds up
MOT moves piece of paper a little closer to CHI
MOT points to and looks at items
CHI looks at item on paper
MOT looks from CHI to paper
CHI leans forwards and reaches hand out for crayon in MOT's hand
CHI takes crayon from MOT's hand
CHI puts crayon down in box
CHI leans forwards and puts hands on paper
MOT straightens up and picks up lid
end of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI watches MOT put lid on box
CHI moves hand out towards MOT and pulls it back
noises are heard from corner where boxes are
MOT comes with a big box
CHI reaches arms out towards box
MOT sits down on floor and opens one of the flaps on box
MOT looks into the box on the floor
MOT starts pulling house out of the box
MOT watches CHI open doll's house
CHI gets down on hands and knees and looks into house
<bef> MOT straightens up and puts hands in lap
CHI rearranges her position so she is lying down on her left side
MOT leans closer to house and looks inside
CHI is holding object from the house in her hand

g.ga: what CHI is holding in her hand

u.a: CHI looks at object in her hand then at what MOT is doing
CHI holds object up in front of her and then lowers it
MOT pushes something in house with her finger
MOT looks at object she is pushing
CHI looks at object MOT was playing with
<bef> CHI transfer object to other hand . CHI reaches out for object MOT was playing with then pulls hand back
CHI looks at something in front of her then at object
CHI looks at something in front of her
MOT straightens up and puts hands in her lap
MOT leans forwards towards house and touches something in it
MOT looks at object she is touching in house
CHI picks up car and makes its wheels turn
CHI continues to make wheels turn . <aft> CHI leans forwards and puts car down
CHI looks at car then glances at kitchen . <aft> CHI looks at car
CHI leans forwards towards house and starts playing with objects in it
CHI looks at MOT and then turns head and looks down
CHI looks at object MOT is looking at
MOT looks down then moves closer to CHI and house

g.ga: what MOT and CHI are looking at

u.a: MOT holds something in her hand
what MOT holds is blocked by the house
CHI moves hand up in front of her
CHI looks at fingernails . <aft> CHI looks at item
MOT points to object in house
CHI takes a doll from house and looks at it
MOT looks at and points to object in house
<bef> CHI looks at item MOT points
it looks like MOT picks up doll and puts it down in car
<aft> reaches out for car with Daddy doll in it
MOT moves hand holding car back and forth pretending it is driving
CHI watches MOT play with car
MOT looks at CHI then at garage
CHI looks at dolls in her hands
CHI plays with dolls in house
MOT points to something in house
CHI leans forward towards right end of house and starts playing with objects in house

g.ga: what MOT points to in next utterances

u.a: <$=2> MOT points to something in garage of house
<$=1> CHI looks at and plays with objects in garage
rattling noises can be heard from the house
CHI takes objects out of house
CHI plays with objects in house
CHI does not pay attention to MOT
noise from something dropping is heard from house
CHI moves head all the way down to house
CHI looks at left end of house
CHI plays with objects in house
<$=4> MOT leans back beside CHI and watches her play
<bef> CHI reaches out for and picks up a bed from house . CHI holds bed up in front of her
CHI stops playing to scratch her back
<bef> MOT picks up a doll . MOT pretends doll is climbing up on CHI lap
CHI continues to scratch her back
when dolls reaches CHI's stomach CHI curls up and turns away
MOT puts doll on floor . <aft> MOT pulls hand back
CHI picks up doll and turns towards MOT
CHI lets doll crawl up on MOT
CHI pulls doll back . <aft> CHI plays with doll in house
CHI puts hands back in lap
MOT reaches arm out and touches something in house
CHI reaches arm out to take something in house
CHI changes her mind and pulls hand back
CHI looks at what MOT touched
CHI picks up something in house
CHI looks at right end of house
MOT leans forwards and picks up object in house
CHI leans head forwards to get a better view of what MOT is doing
CHI leans forwards towards right end of house
CHI looks at objects in right end of house
CHI plays with object in house
CHI looks at right end of house
CHI starts playing with objects in left end of house
CHI looks at objects in left end of house
CHI moves three objects from the left to the right end of house one at a time
<bef> CHI looks down at objects in left end of house . CHI looks quickly to the side . <aft> CHI looks at items in left end of house
CHI lifts arms up then lets them fall back in her lap
<bef> CHI looks at right end of house
MOT leans head forwards towards house
MOT looks at right end of house
CHI leans forwards for a second and puts hand on floor . <aft> CHI turns torso around away from MOT
CHI turns around and looks behind her then looks in the direction of the house again
CHI touches floor with both hands
CHI looks at and taps something in house
MOT looks at object CHI taps
CHI plays with objects in house
MOT moves head to get a better view
<bef> CHI moves objects around . CHI straightens up then lifts arm in air and lets them fall down on her thighs
CHI looks down in her lap
CHI leans forwards and starts playing with objects in right end of house
CHI looks at objects in right side of house
MOT holds onto house with one hand
MOT looks at house . <aft> MOT looks down at CHI
MOT pulls hand back and puts it under her chin
<bef> CHI straightens up . CHI lifts arms in the air and lets them fall down on thighs
CHI looks at objects she was just playing with
CHI slaps her thighs again . <aft> CHI slaps thighs alternating hands
CHI looks at left side of house
<bef> CHI stops slapping herself . <aft> CHI puts arms on floor
CHI picks up object from house
CHI moves object from left end of house to the right end and puts it in house
CHI takes objects out of house and puts them on floor in front of house
CHI plays with object in right side of house
CHI looks at object in right side of house
MOT holds onto house with hand
a closing noise can be heard from doll's house
CHI looks at objects she was playing with
CHI grabs something in right end of house . <aft> CHI puts object further back in house
<bef> CHI starts rearranging objects in house . CHI picks up a doll and another object which looks like a chair from left end of house
CHI looks at objects she is playing with
CHI puts doll in chair . <aft> CHI puts chair in left end of house
CHI moves objects from the right to the left end of house one by one
<bef> CHI puts object on floor into right end of house
CHI turns torso around and looks up at MOT then looks at house
CHI starts playing with objects in right end of house
<aft> CHI looks over her shoulder and up at MOT
CHI gathers dolls in left end of house in her hands
CHI looks at right end of house then down at objects in her hands
CHI looks at right end of house then glances at object in her hands and then looks up at right end of house again
MOT points to house with hand then puts hand under her chin
CHI looks down at objects in her hands
MOT leans forward reaching into the house
MOT looks at and points to door in left end of house
CHI follows MOT's hands with eyes
CHI leans head forwards towards left end of house
MOT pulls hand out of left end of house
CHI starts to play with dolls
CHI inclines head to the side
